definition: component in Chinese characters, occurring in 青, 毒, 素 etc/see also 青字頭|青字头[qing1 zi4 tou2]
"walk slowly" component in Chinese characters/see also 冬字頭|冬字头[dong1 zi4 tou2]

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a wheat germ nutrient flour and its preparation method.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及一种麦胚营养粉及其制备方法。

sentences.english: Magda, this is my friend, Katie.
sentences.chinese: 麦格达，这是我的朋友凯蒂。

sentences.english: It's a good idea to use two of the same model with the overheads.
sentences.chinese: 用两支和OH麦相同型号的麦克是一个不错的主意。

sentences.english: Washed by rain, the wheat field and grape trellises in front of the door beautifully shimmered with brilliant yellow and tender green.
sentences.chinese: 门前的麦垅和葡萄架子，都濯得新黄嫩绿的非常鲜丽。

sentences.english: Tea mixed with other wheat cereals, wheat has a dove, we called APF meters.
sentences.chinese: 麦茶与其他谷类混合，有一种鸠麦，我们叫薏仁米。

sentences.english: This is an area where dynamics and condensers are used about equally.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个动圈麦和电容麦差不多都同被使用到的区域。

sentences.english: I'd like a Fillet-o-Fish and an apple pie.
sentences.chinese: 我要一个麦香鱼和一个苹果派。

sentences.english: Archangel Michael is the Angel of Miracles who strengthens the spirit during difficult times or dangerous situations.
sentences.chinese: 大天使麦可是在艰难或危险时刻强化心智的奇迹天使。

sentences.english: I consider myself lucky to know Uncle Melrose.
sentences.chinese: 认识麦罗斯叔叔我觉得自已很幸运。

sentences.english: You're a student too, Magda. How do you manage?
sentences.chinese: 麦格达，你也是学生，你是怎么应对这些问题的呢？

sentences.english: McDull has to go to Wudang Mountain to study taijiquan.
sentences.chinese: 而悲惨的麦兜却要到武当山上学太极。

sentences.english: McGill believes the city's expansion bodes ill.
sentences.chinese: 麦基尔认为，该城市的扩张前景堪忧。

sentences.english: In fact, Mr Malkiel is, overall, very bullish.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，麦基尔总体而言非常乐观。

sentences.english: But I wouldn`t want him to ever grow up in the cartoons.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我从没想过要让麦兜在漫画中长大。

sentences.english: "It's been like quite a few of our games recently, " McGuinness told MUTV .
sentences.chinese: “最近好几场都是这样，”麦基尼斯告诉曼联电视。

definition: Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
to eat/(extended meaning) to endure/putrid smell/vegetables/roots (inextricably attached to the plant)
luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm
